name: The Horizontal Kingdom
description: The Horizonal Kingdom is a frantic tower defense game in which you must defend your towers from destruction ! Place your troops with a strategic mind, each one has it's strengths and weaknesses ! If you have never played the game before check out the RULES page, it is very quick to understand but if you don't check it out, you won't be able to play ! Have fun and of course thanks so much for playing ! All feedback and structured criticism is always welcome !
